en: Collected memory
Ammo refilled
Press 'R' to restart
YES! Finally it worked... Subject_3 can you understand me?
Uhh.. y-yes. Where am I? Who am I?
You are a.. um.. Artificial Intelligence in a simulation. My simulation.
I guess... Ok?
Let's see if your motor skills work. Move with the CURSOR keys or WASD.
You can jump by using X/V/Space.
Ok, I already expected something like this.
Damn, it seems like you're stucked. Try pressing R to restart.
Ok.
Wait.. what? Why are there two of you now? This must be a BUG!
Subject_3, try to use your former self to cross the gap!
Subje.. My name is .. M-Marc!
(shook) Oh boy, his consciousness... returns!
I know that voice! What have you done to me?!
Mad Professor is his real name.
Looks like collecting this RAM bites are helping me remember.
He must be keeping my consciousness trapped in this simulation.
So you've made it out of the first stage. Good.
I've looked into the code, the bug must have been...
You are the Mad Professor, I can remember now.
All right, now what?
You will never get out of here. HAHAHAHA
hm, looks like the bug has not been fixed.
I should really make use of my ghosts.
Wake up Neo.. the MATRIX is calling you!
Lol. Not funny. Who are you?
Oh yes, we are just the developers of this simulation.
Stop stop! That would still be me.
All right. Imagine that we are the sinister force that created all this.
So, like a God?
Exactly
So, I'm free now?
NOOOOOOO!
No. There are many more challenges waiting for you.
But we didn't have time to create more levels.
Thanks for playing, we hope you had fun.
Wait! No!
Hell yes!
